Second, once we know the different pieces, can we separate them from a systems perspective ( I am assuming that separating people is straightforward)? Third, assuming we can separate things, how we communicate back to the other parts. In other words, how we communicate information back to Enron's SAP system, how we settle for Enron if they want ProcessCo to do physical settlements, how we receive information so we can deal capture and confirm, etc. All the linkages.
